name: Seasons in Kawung
description:
This piece is inspired by the Javanese Batik Motif called Kawung and it's richness of meaning. The name is based of the fruit of the Tal palm tree and symbolizes life at the center with all that comes with it, and man in its place in the world.
With this comes the meditation of life cycle: from dust, to growth, to bloom to ashes; This Too Shall Pass. 
It is best that we remember where we came from, and make peace with the changes that comes in life. May you thrive where ever you're sown.
